features: Made of tough, easy-care, 100% recycled nylon with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
Designed to roll up into its own interior pocket for easy packing
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
4.5-oz (prints: 4.3-oz) 100% recycled nylon with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Fabric is certified as bluesign® approved. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
